name: üöÄ Go-Live & Hypercare
description: Critical resources and checklists for SuccessFactors go-live events and hypercare support

shortcuts.name: System Status Dashboard
shortcuts.description: Monitor system health and job status

notes.title: üéØ Go-Live Day Checklist
notes.content:
=== Pre Go-Live (T-24 Hours) ===
‚òê Freeze all configuration changes
‚òê Complete final data migration
‚òê Verify all integrations are running
‚òê Confirm job schedules aligned with go-live
‚òê Set up war room with key stakeholders
‚òê Test incident escalation procedures
‚òê Verify backup/rollback plan
‚òê Confirm cutover runbook reviewed

=== Go-Live Day (T=0) ===
‚òê Execute cutover steps per runbook
‚òê Monitor system health dashboard
‚òê Verify critical background jobs running
‚òê Test user login access
‚òê Validate HRIS integrations
‚òê Check email notifications working
‚òê Verify reporting data accuracy
‚òê Monitor system performance metrics

=== Post Go-Live (T+4 Hours) ===
‚òê Review all background job logs
‚òê Validate data integrity checks
‚òê Monitor help desk ticket volume
‚òê Track system performance metrics
‚òê Document any issues/workarounds
‚òê Prepare daily status report

=== Hypercare Week 1 ===
‚òê Daily war room check-ins
‚òê Monitor system health 24/7
‚òê Track and resolve incidents quickly
‚òê Review job execution patterns
‚òê Validate integration stability
‚òê Gather user feedback
‚òê Update knowledge base articles

notes.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Critical Background Jobs
notes.content:
=== Daily Jobs ===
‚Ä¢ HRIS Sync (Employee Central)
‚Ä¢ Payroll Data Export
‚Ä¢ Benefits Enrollment Updates
‚Ä¢ Performance Management Notifications
‚Ä¢ Learning Assignments Sync

=== Hourly/Real-Time Jobs ===
‚Ä¢ ODATA Integration Polling
‚Ä¢ Email Notification Queue
‚Ä¢ Workflow Escalations
‚Ä¢ Real-Time Data Replication

=== Weekly Jobs ===
‚Ä¢ User Provisioning Audit
‚Ä¢ Report Generation
‚Ä¢ Data Archival
‚Ä¢ System Maintenance Tasks

‚ö†Ô∏è Job Failure Response:
1. Check job logs in Background Jobs
2. Verify integration connectivity
3. Review data quality issues
4. Re-run job if transient failure
5. Escalate to SAP if persistent

üìä Success Metrics:
‚Ä¢ Job completion rate: >99%
‚Ä¢ Average execution time: within SLA
‚Ä¢ Error rate: <1%

notes.title: üîÑ Integration Health Monitoring
notes.content:
=== Integration Types ===

1. **HRIS Integrations**
   ‚Ä¢ Employee Central ‚Üí Downstream systems
   ‚Ä¢ Payroll feeds (inbound/outbound)
   ‚Ä¢ Benefits administration
   ‚Ä¢ Time & Attendance sync

2. **SSO/Authentication**
   ‚Ä¢ SAML assertion validation
   ‚Ä¢ User provisioning (SCIM)
   ‚Ä¢ Azure AD / Okta sync

3. **Third-Party Apps**
   ‚Ä¢ Learning Management (LMS)
   ‚Ä¢ Recruiting (ATS)
   ‚Ä¢ Compensation planning
   ‚Ä¢ Survey tools

=== Monitoring Points ===
‚òê Integration Center status: All green
‚òê ODATA API call success rate: >99%
‚òê SFTP file transfers: On schedule
‚òê Webhook delivery: No failures
‚òê Error queue: Empty or minimal

=== Troubleshooting Steps ===
1. Check Integration Center logs
2. Verify API credentials/certificates
3. Test connectivity (network/firewall)
4. Review data mapping errors
5. Check for rate limiting
6. Validate endpoint availability

notes.title: üö® Incident Escalation Matrix
notes.content:
=== Severity Levels ===

**SEV 1 - Critical (Response: Immediate)**
‚Ä¢ System down/unavailable
‚Ä¢ Data corruption affecting payroll
‚Ä¢ Security breach
‚Ä¢ Critical integration failure

**SEV 2 - High (Response: 2 hours)**
‚Ä¢ Major feature not working
‚Ä¢ Performance degradation
‚Ä¢ Integration delays
‚Ä¢ Widespread user impact

**SEV 3 - Medium (Response: 8 hours)**
‚Ä¢ Minor feature issues
‚Ä¢ Isolated user problems
‚Ä¢ Non-critical job failures
‚Ä¢ Reporting discrepancies

**SEV 4 - Low (Response: 24 hours)**
‚Ä¢ Enhancement requests
‚Ä¢ Cosmetic issues
‚Ä¢ Questions/clarifications

=== Escalation Path ===
1. **L1 Support**: War room team
2. **L2 Support**: Implementation partner
3. **L3 Support**: SAP Support ticket
4. **Executive**: If business-critical

=== SAP Support ===
‚Ä¢ Component: LOD-SF-[MODULE]
‚Ä¢ Priority: Very High for SEV 1
‚Ä¢ Include: Screenshots, logs, steps to reproduce
‚Ä¢ Reference: Customer success plan number

notes.title: üîß Common Go-Live Issues & Fixes
notes.content:
=== User Access Issues ===
**Problem**: Users can't log in
**Check**:
‚Ä¢ SSO configuration active?
‚Ä¢ User provisioning job completed?
‚Ä¢ RBP permissions assigned?
‚Ä¢ Default locale/timezone set?

=== Data Issues ===
**Problem**: Missing or incorrect data
**Check**:
‚Ä¢ Import jobs completed successfully?
‚Ä¢ Data validation rules passed?
‚Ä¢ Effective dating correct?
‚Ä¢ Picklist values mapped?

=== Integration Failures ===
**Problem**: HRIS sync not working
**Check**:
‚Ä¢ Integration Center job status
‚Ä¢ API credentials valid?
‚Ä¢ Network connectivity OK?
‚Ä¢ Data format matches schema?

=== Performance Issues ===
**Problem**: System slow or timeout
**Check**:
‚Ä¢ Concurrent users vs. capacity
‚Ä¢ Large report queries?
‚Ä¢ Background jobs competing?
‚Ä¢ Database performance metrics

=== Email Notifications ===
**Problem**: Emails not sending
**Check**:
‚Ä¢ Email notification settings ON?
‚Ä¢ User has valid email address?
‚Ä¢ Email job queue processing?
‚Ä¢ SMTP/mail relay configured?

notes.title: üìä Go-Live Performance Metrics
notes.content:
=== System Health KPIs ===

**Availability**
‚Ä¢ Target: 99.9% uptime
‚Ä¢ Measure: System Status Dashboard
‚Ä¢ Alert: <99.5%

**Performance**
‚Ä¢ Page load time: <3 seconds
‚Ä¢ API response time: <500ms
‚Ä¢ Job execution: Within SLA
‚Ä¢ Report generation: <30 seconds

**Data Quality**
‚Ä¢ Import success rate: >99%
‚Ä¢ Data validation pass rate: 100%
‚Ä¢ Integration accuracy: >99.9%
‚Ä¢ Reconciliation errors: <0.1%

**User Adoption**
‚Ä¢ Login success rate: >95%
‚Ä¢ Active users: Match employee count
‚Ä¢ Help desk tickets: <5% of users
‚Ä¢ Training completion: >80%

=== Daily Reports ===
1. System health summary
2. Background job status
3. Integration execution log
4. Incident summary & resolution
5. User access issues
6. Performance metrics dashboard

=== Week 1 Milestones ===
Day 1: Stabilization
Day 3: User adoption trending up
Day 5: Incident volume decreasing
Day 7: Transition to BAU support
